Class DotInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • DotInfo

  • public class DotInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    The class DotInfo is a simple helper class to store the state (e.g. clicked, mined, number of neighbooring mines...) at the dot position (x,y)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor, used to initialize the instance variables
